trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET HTTP handler that processes a request for a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务发现文档处理的请求 ASP.NET HTTP 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The DiscoveryRequestHandler class, via its <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, processes an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryRequestHandler 类中，通过其<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，处理发现文档的 HTTP 请求。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A discovery document is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> class and is usually serialized as a file using a .disco extension.
trans-unit.target: 发现文档由<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>类，通常会为文件使用.disco 扩展序列化。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: Web services discovery provides a mechanism for determining the Web services that are available at a given location.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务发现提供用于确定在给定位置的 Web 服务的机制。

trans-unit.source: The DiscoveryRequestHandler class normally does not need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryRequestHandler 类通常不需要直接由开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler"></xref> class.

Gets a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, indicates whether the instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler"></xref> (or a derived class) is reusable.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值的<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，该值指示是否实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler"> </xref> （或派生的类） 是可重复使用。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Handles an HTTP request for a discovery document, which is serialized to the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 处理对发现文档，序列化到 HTTP 响应的 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessRequest method searches for applicable files within the file system path corresponding to the HTTP request's Uniform Resource Locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: ProcessRequest 方法搜索适用文件内相应到 HTTP 请求的统一资源定位器 (URL) 的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The search may extend to subdirectories and switch target file extensions depending on what it finds in the root search directory.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能将扩展到子目录和切换目标文件扩展名，具体取决于它在根搜索目录中找到。

trans-unit.source: The search process populates the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> object's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> property with files that are found.
trans-unit.target: 搜索过程填充<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>对象的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A>使用找到的文件的属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request*> and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response*> properties of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> class are used for input and output, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 和<> *1> 属性<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>类用于输入和输出，分别。
